name: PCKG_INV
body_snippet:
package pckg_inv is

  -- Author  : Tariq Sarwar
  -- Created : 18-11-2002 11:50:19 AM
  -- Purpose : procedures and functions for inventory method calculation

  procedure update_item_value(parm_change_date        DATE,
                              parm_inv_transaction_no NUMBER,
                              parm_item_id            NUMBER,
                              parm_sub_inv_id         NUMBER,
                              parm_loc_id             NUMBER,
                              parm_base_items_only    number);
  procedure sub_update_item_value(parm_change_date        DATE,
                                  parm_inv_transaction_no NUMBER,
                                  parm_item_id            NUMBER,
                                  parm_sub_inv_id         NUMBER,
                                  parm_loc_id             NUMBER,
                                  parm_base_items_only    number);

  FUNCTION get_balance_qty(parm_last_years_id      NUMBER,
                           parm_start_date         DATE,
                           parm_inv_org            NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
